The Verdict - State Vs Nanavati

Series

  • OTT Release Date: 30 Sep 2019
  • Genre(s): Crime, Drama
  • Language(s): हिन्दी
  • Director(s): Shashant Shah
  • Cast(s): Sumeet Vyas, Angad Bedi, Saurabh Shukla, Makrand Deshpande, Soni Razdan See all Cast & Crew
  • Award(s): OTT Film/ Series 2020 (Won)
    Technical 2020 (Nominated) Awards List
  • Similar To: The Night Manager, Scoop
  • Story:

    The Verdict - State Vs Nanavati is a crime drama in which Indian Naval commander Nanavati returns home to find about his wife's affair. Jealousy leads to a murder that sparks a nationwide drama. When people, media and politics get into a war of opinions, it turns into a case that divided India.

    Full Story
7.1/10

The Verdict - State Vs Nanavati - IMAGE GALLERY

STORY AND RATINGS

Story

The Verdict - State Vs Nanavati is a crime drama in which Indian Naval commander Nanavati returns home to find about his wife's affair. Jealousy leads to a murder that sparks a nationwide drama. When people, media and politics get into a war of opinions, it turns into a case that divided India.

Ratings

7.1/10

IMDb

AWARDS

Won
OTT Film/ Series Award

Most Glamorous Actress In a Series | 2020 | Elli

Nominations
Technical Award

Best Costume Design | 2020

TRIVIA

Trivia

Based on real life incident in which Naval Commander Kavas Nanavati fired three rounds on Prem Ahuja for having an affair with his wife Sylvia, while he was away on navy missions.

Rustom, a 2016 Hindi film, was made on the same subject with Akshay Kumar in the lead and Illeana D'cruz playing his wife.
